reactor.core.alloc

Interface Reference<T extends Recyclable>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Supplier<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractReference

    public interface Reference<T extends Recyclable>
extends Supplier<T>
    A Reference provides access to and metadata about a poolable object.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getAge()
      Get the age of this Reference since it's creation.
      int getReferenceCount()
      Get the current number of references retained to this object.

      Decrease the reference count by 1.
      void release(int decr)
      Decrease the reference count by incr amount.

        get

    • Method Detail

      • getAge

        long getAge()
        Get the age of this Reference since it's creation.
        Returns:
        the number of milliseconds since this Reference was created.

      • getReferenceCount

        int getReferenceCount()
        Get the current number of references retained to this object.
        Returns:
        the reference count.

      • retain

        void retain()
        Increase reference count by 1.

      • retain

        void retain(int incr)
        Increase reference count by incr amount.
        Parameters:
        incr - the amount to increment the reference count.

      • release

        void release()
        Decrease the reference count by 1.

      • release

        void release(int decr)
        Decrease the reference count by incr amount.
        Parameters:
        decr - the amount to decrement the reference count.
